Class Actor

java.lang.Object
Actor
public abstract class Actor extends Object
The interface to be extended by any class wishing to participate in the simulation. Represents an entity that exists in the environment and can take actions.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Tanjim Islam invalid input: '&' Keiran Matthews

    • location

      protected Location location

  • Constructor Details

    • Actor

      public Actor(Location location)
      Constructor for a new Actor. The actor is set to be active by default.
      Parameters:
      location - The initial location of the actor.

  • Method Details

    • act

      public abstract void act(Field currentField, Field nextFieldState, Environment env)
      Defines the behavior of the actor in the simulation. Must be implemented by subclasses.
      Parameters:
      currentField - The current state of the field.
      nextFieldState - The new state being built for the next simulation step.
      env - The environment containing weather and time information.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Checks if the actor is still active in the simulation.
      Returns:
      true if the actor is active, false otherwise.

    • getLocation

      public Location getLocation()
      Gets the current location of the actor.
      Returns:
      The actor's location.

    • setLocation

      protected void setLocation(Location location)
      Updates the actor's location.
      Parameters:
      location - The new location to set.

    • setActive

      protected void setActive(boolean active)
      Sets whether the actor is active in the simulation.
      Parameters:
      active - The new active state of the actor.
